english.segment1: God save me it's me against this whole world i can't fight it alone i'm (still) so sick to my own death sick of all the hypocrisy (still) sick of the lies that surround me take me away all the politics that confine me who knows who their better than you crew i won't be another victim cause I'm never going back no I'm never going back again after everything I have seen I've been through it's me against this whole world and i can't fight it alone God save me.
